ECU 请求包[51个字节]：APS1300051A101AAA0123456789012A10100000000000000END

EMA 确认包[52个字节]: APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A100000000000000000END

【A102】
上报逆变器ID
EMA A102包[51个字节]：APS1300051A101AAA0123456789012A10200000000000000END

ECU 回应包[62+22X]：APS1300106A102AAA012345678901210M1.0SAA--200200000000000000END2017032200010000000END2017031500010000000END!

【A103】
设置逆变器ID  清除逆变器
EMA A103包[51个字节]：APS1300051A103AAA0123456789012000000000000000000END

ECU 回应包[52个字节]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A103000000000000000END

设置逆变器ID 添加逆变器
EMA A103包[51+15X]：APS1300081A103AAA0123456789012100200000000000000END201703150001END201703220001END

ECU 回应包[52个字节]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A103000000000000000END

设置逆变器ID 删除逆变器
EMA A103包[51+15X]：APS1300066A103AAA0123456789012200100000000000000END201703150001END

ECU 回应包[52个字节]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A103000000000000000END


【A106】
ECU上传与EMA通信有关的配置信息
EMA A106包[51个字节]：APS1300051A101AAA0123456789012A10600000000000000END

ECU 回应包[59+2(20+A)]：APS1300116A106AAA0123456789012200000000000000END10809308093010051111.apsema.comEND20899708997010011eee.apsema.comEND

【A107】
EMA设置ECU通信配置参数
EMA A107包[48+2(20+A)]：APS1300081A107AAA0123456789012100000000000000END16553565535999111www.baidu.comEND

ECU 回应包[52个字节]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A107000000000000000END


【A110】
最大保护功率设置
EMA A110包[]广播：APS1300058A110AAA01234567890120000000000000000000END258END

ECU 回应包[]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A110000000000000000END

EMA A110包[]单播：APS1300070A110AAA01234567890121000100000000000000END201703150001250END

ECU 回应包[]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A110000000000000000END

【A117】
上传每个逆变器的功率和功率范围
EMA A117包[]：APS1300051A101AAA0123456789012A11700000000000000END

ECU 回应包[]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A117000000000000000END



【A111】
设置逆变器的开关机
EMA A111包[]广播：APS1300052A111AAA01234567890121000000000000000000END

ECU 回应包[]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A111000000000000000END

EMA A111包[]单播：APS1300068A111AAA01234567890122000100000000000000END2017031500010END

ECU 回应包[]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A111000000000000000END


【A112】
GFDI/IRD 设置
EMA A112包[]广播：APS1300052A112AAA01234567890120000000000000000000END

ECU 回应包[]： APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A112000000000000000END

EMA A112包[]单播：APS1300068A112AAA01234567890121000100000000000000END2017031500011END

ECU 回应包[]： APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A112000000000000000END

【A119】
设置 ecu 开关，1 正常通讯，0 只保持有轮询不再上报任何数据，ecu 默认是 1
EMA A119包[]：APS1300048A119AAA0123456789012000000000000001END

ECU 回应包[]： APS1300048A119AAA0123456789012000000000000000END
